articles.title: Joma Sison on terror tag, America, and karaoke - Rappler
articles.description: Two decades ago, the world seemed to close in on the exiled chief of the Communist Party of the Philippines, who was then declared a terrorist by the European Union
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines Newsbreak magazine interviewed Jose Maria Sison over two decades ago on October 19, 2002 in his office in Utrecht. Sison died on Friday, December 16, 2022 (Manila time). We are re… [+18339 chars]

articles.author: Mark Osborne, Teddy Grant
articles.title: American college student Kenny DeLand missing from French university found in Spain after 3 weeks - ABC News
articles.description: DeLand had been studying at the University of Grenoble Alpes.
articles.content: Missing American college student Kenny DeLand Jr. has been located in Spain three weeks after he walked away from the University of Grenoble Alpes and apparently stopped communicating with friends an… [+1905 chars]
